00025 void AlgorithmRunner::calculateMaxMin(const hgeVector& p1, const hgeVector& p2, const hgeVector& p3, hgeVector& minOut, hgeVector& maxOut)
00026 {
00027     minOut.x = p1.x;
00028     minOut.y = p1.y;
00029     maxOut.x = p1.x;
00030     maxOut.y = p1.y;
00031 
00032     if (p2.x < minOut.x)
00033         minOut.x = p2.x;
00034     else if (p2.x > maxOut.x)
00035         maxOut.x = p2.x;
00036 
00037     if (p3.x < minOut.x)
00038         minOut.x = p3.x;
00039     else if (p3.x > maxOut.x)
00040         maxOut.x = p3.x;
00041 
00042     if (p2.y < minOut.y)
00043         minOut.y = p2.y;
00044     else if (p2.y > maxOut.y)
00045         maxOut.y = p2.y;
00046 
00047     if (p3.y < minOut.y)
00048         minOut.y = p3.y;
00049     else if (p3.y > maxOut.y)
00050         maxOut.y = p3.y;
00051 }

00053 const bool AlgorithmRunner::pointsClockwise(CyclicVector<hgeVector> points)
00054 {
00055     double sum = 0;
00056 
00057     for (int i = 0; i < points.size() - 1; ++i)
00058         sum += (points[i].x * points[i + 1].y - points[i + 1].x * points[i].y);
00059 
00060     if (sum < 0)
00061         return true;
00062     else
00063         return false;
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool AlgorithmRunner::vertexConvex(const hgeVector& v1, const hgeVector& v2, const hgeVector& v3)
00067 {
00068     double sum = 0;
00069 
00070     sum += v1.x * (v3.y - v2.y);
00071     sum += v2.x * (v1.y - v3.y);
00072     sum += v3.x * (v2.y - v1.y);
00073 
00074     if (sum < 0)
00075         return false;
00076     else
00077         return true;
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool AlgorithmRunner::pointInsideStandard(const hgeVector& A, const hgeVector& B, const hgeVector& C, const hgeVector& P)
00081 {
00082     hgeVector v0 = C - A;
00083     hgeVector v1 = B - A;
00084     hgeVector v2 = P - A;
00085 
00086     double dot00 = v0.Dot(&v0);
00087     double dot01 = v0.Dot(&v1);
00088     double dot02 = v0.Dot(&v2);
00089     double dot11 = v1.Dot(&v1);
00090     double dot12 = v1.Dot(&v2);
00091 
00092     double invDenom = 1 / (dot00 * dot11 - dot01 * dot01);
00093     double u = (dot11 * dot02 - dot01 * dot12) * invDenom;
00094     double v = (dot00 * dot12 - dot01 * dot02) * invDenom;
00095 
00096     return (u > 0) && (v > 0) && (u + v < 1);
00097 }
00098 
00099 bool AlgorithmRunner::pointInsideOptomized(const hgeVector& minCoords, const hgeVector& maxCoords, const hgeVector& A, const hgeVector& B, const hgeVector& C, const hgeVector& P)
00100 {
00101     if (P.x <= minCoords.x || P.x >= maxCoords.x || P.y <= minCoords.y || P.y >= maxCoords.y)
00102         return false;
00103     else
00104     {
00105         return pointInsideStandard(A, B, C, P);
00106     }
00107 }

00109 void AlgorithmRunner::processShapeStandard(vector<hgeVector>* points, TriangleShape* output)
00110 {
00111     if (points->size() == 3)
00112         output->addTriangle(points->at(0), points->at(1), points->at(2));
00113     else if (points->size() > 3)
00114     {
00115         for (int i = 0; i < points->size() - 2; ++i)
00116         {
00117             if (!vertexConvex(points->at(i), points->at(i + 1), points->at(i + 2)))
00118                 continue;
00119 
00120             if (i > 0)
00121             {
00122                 for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j)
00123                 {
00124                     if (pointInsideStandard(points->at(i), points->at(i + 1), points->at(i + 2), points->at(j)))
00125                         continue;
00126                 }
00127             }
00128 
00129             if (i < points->size() - 3)
00130             {
00131                 for (int j = i + 3; j < points->size(); ++j)
00132                 {
00133                     if (pointInsideStandard(points->at(i), points->at(i + 1), points->at(i + 2), points->at(j)))
00134                         continue;
00135                 }
00136             }
00137 
00138             output->addTriangle(points->at(i), points->at(i + 1), points->at(i + 2));
00139             points->erase(points->begin() + i + 1);
00140         }
00141 
00142         bool validEar = true;
00143 
00144         if (vertexConvex(points->at(points->size() - 2), points->at(points->size() - 1), points->at(0)))
00145         {
00146             for (int i = 1; i < points->size() - 1; ++ i)
00147             {
00148                 if (pointInsideStandard(points->at(points->size() - 2), points->at(points->size() - 1), points->at(0), points->at(i)))
00149                 {
00150                     validEar = false;
00151                     break;
00152                 }
00153             }
00154 
00155             if (validEar)
00156             {
00157                 validEar = true;
00158                 output->addTriangle(points->at(points->size() - 2), points->at(points->size() - 1), points->at(0));
00159                 points->erase(points->end());
00160             }
00161         }
00162 
00163         validEar = true;
00164 
00165         if (vertexConvex(points->at(points->size() - 1), points->at(0), points->at(1)))
00166         {
00167             for (int i = 2; i < points->size() - 1; ++ i)
00168             {
00169                 if (pointInsideStandard(points->at(points->size() - 1), points->at(0), points->at(1), points->at(i)))
00170                 {
00171                     validEar = false;
00172                     break;
00173                 }
00174             }
00175 
00176             if (validEar)
00177             {
00178                 output->addTriangle(points->at(points->size() - 1), points->at(0), points->at(1));
00179                 points->erase(points->begin());
00180             }
00181         }
00182 
00183         processShapeStandard(points, output);
00184     }
00185     else if (points->size() < 3)
00186         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Error converting polygon!");
00187 }
00188 
00189 void AlgorithmRunner::processShapeOptomized(CyclicVector<hgeVector> points, TriangleShape* output)
00190 {
00191     if (!pointsClockwise(points))
00192     {
00193         for (int i = 0; i < points.size() / 2; ++i)
00194         {
00195             hgeVector tmp = points[i];
00196             points[i] = points[points.size() - 1 - i];
00197             points[points.size() - 1 - i] = tmp;
00198         }
00199     }
00200 
00201     CyclicVector<hgeVector>::iterator iter1 = points.begin();
00202     while (points.size() > 3)
00203     {
00204         hgeVector point1 = *iter1;
00205         hgeVector point2 = points[iter1.getIndex() + 1];
00206         hgeVector point3 = points[iter1.getIndex() + 2];
00207 
00208         if (vertexConvex(point1, point2, point3))
00209         {
00210             hgeVector minRect(0, 0);
00211             hgeVector maxRect(0, 0);
00212             calculateMaxMin(point1, point2, point3, minRect, maxRect);
00213 
00214             CyclicVector<hgeVector>::iterator iter2 = iter1 + 3;
00215             bool validEar = true;
00216             while (iter2 != iter1)
00217             {
00218                 if (pointInsideOptomized(minRect, maxRect, point1, point2, point3, *iter2))
00219                 {
00220                     validEar = false;
00221                     break;
00222                 }
00223                 else
00224                     ++iter2;
00225             }
00226 
00227             if (validEar)
00228             {
00229                 output->addTriangle(point1, point2, point3);
00230                 points.erase(iter1 + 1);
00231             }
00232         }
00233         ++iter1;
00234     }
00235     output->addTriangle(points[0], points[1], points[2]);
00236 }

00238 void AlgorithmRunner::convertShape(PointShape* shape, TriangleShape* output1, TriangleShape* output2)
00239 {
00240     const bool clockwise = pointsClockwise(shape->getPoints());
00241 
00242     LARGE_INTEGER start;
00243     LARGE_INTEGER end;
00244     LARGE_INTEGER elapsed1;
00245 
00246     if (clockwise)
00247     {
00248         QueryPerformanceCounter(&start);
00249 
00250         vector<hgeVector> points1 = shape->getPoints().getSource();
00251         processShapeStandard(&points1, output1);
00252 
00253         QueryPerformanceCounter(&end);
00254 
00255         elapsed1.QuadPart = end.QuadPart - start.QuadPart;
00256     }
00257 
00258     QueryPerformanceCounter(&start);
00259 
00260     processShapeOptomized(shape->getPoints(), output2);
00261 
00262     QueryPerformanceCounter(&end);
00263 
00264     LARGE_INTEGER elapsed2;
00265     elapsed2.QuadPart = end.QuadPart - start.QuadPart;
00266 
00267     ofstream report;
00268     report.open("../report.txt", ios::app);
00269 
00270     if (clockwise)
00271         report << "\nClock Cycles Taken for Unoptomized Algorithm: " << elapsed1.QuadPart;
00272     else
00273         report << "\nClock Cycles Taken for Unoptomized Algorithm: " << "N/A";
00274     report << "\nClock Cycles Taken for Optomized Algorithm: " << elapsed2.QuadPart;
00275     if (clockwise)
00276     {
00277         report << "\nTime differencial, positive value means optomized version was faster: " << elapsed1.QuadPart - elapsed2.QuadPart;
00278         report << "\nDecrease %: " << (100 - (double)elapsed2.QuadPart / (double)elapsed1.QuadPart * 100);
00279     }
00280     else
00281     {
00282         report << "\nTime differencial, positive value means optomized version was faster: " << "N/A";
00283         report << "\nDecrease %: " << "N/A";
00284     }
00285     report << "\n Shape Points: " << shape->getSummary();
00286     if (clockwise)
00287         report << "\n Unoptomized Output: " << output1->getSummary();
00288     else
00289         report << "\n Unoptomized Output: " << "N/A";
00290     report << "\n Optomized Output: " << output2->getSummary() << "\n";
00291 
00292     report.close();
00293 }
